articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Why Danny Boyle shot ‘28 Years Later’ on iPhones - TechCrunch
articles.description: Director Danny Boyle famously shot his post-apocalyptic classic “28 Days Later” on Canon digital cameras, making it easier for him to capture eerie scenes
articles.content: Director Danny Boyle famously shot his post-apocalyptic classic 28 Days Later on Canon digital cameras, making it easier for him to capture eerie scenes of an abandoned London, and giving the movies … [+953 chars]
